long_description: The 2,600mAh Nitecore Rechargeable 18650 Lithium-ion battery is compatible with most brands of high-drain devices, such as a powerful LED flashlight, that accept 18650 batteries. 2,600mAh lithium-ion battery recharges in the Nitecore Intellicharge i4 battery charger (sold separately). The mAh capacity refers to the storage capacity for a battery; a higher mAh number generally indicates a longer run time. A single rechargeable 18650 battery can be recharged more than 500 times, making it equivalent to 500 pairs of disposable CR123 lithium-ion batteries. Built-in over-charge and over-discharge protection circuit ensures excellent battery performance. Package includes one 2,600mAh Nitecore Rechargeable 18650 Lithium-ion battery.
short_description: The 2,600mAh Nitecore Rechargeable 18650 Lithium-ion battery is compatible with most brands of high-drain devices, such as a powerful LED flashlight, that accept 18650 batteries.
